item.title: 食品通胀加剧，日本消费者寻求实惠
item.description: 日本的通货膨胀率为 4%，但小宫山泰美（Taemi Komiyama）发现，养家糊口的成本上升速度远远超过这个数字。【原文：Inflation in Japan is running at 4%, but Taemi Komiyama finds the cost of feeding her family is escalating much faster than that.】

item.title: 泡泡茶巨头 Mixue 将在香港今年最大规模首次公开募股后亮相
item.description: 中国最大的泡泡茶连锁店美雪集团将于周一在香港开始交易，此前个人投资者蜂拥而至，参与了该公司34.5亿港元（4.44亿美元）的首次公开募股。【原文：Mixue Group, China’s largest bubble-tea chain, will begin trading in Hong Kong on Monday after individual investors flocked to the company’s blockbuster HK$3.45 billion ($444 million) initial public offering.】

item.title: 中国内地投资者对港股的偏爱与日俱增
item.description: 中国内地投资者对港股的支持力度正在加大，这有助于缓解港股相对于在岸同业的估值折让，并预示着港股可能会进一步上涨。【原文：Mainland Chinese investors’ support for Hong Kong stocks is growing, helping to ease their valuation discount to onshore peers and indicating the city’s shares may rise further.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商在东南亚面临现实考验
item.description: 最近一个星期四的上午，河内的中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪公司（BYD Co.而就在几公里外，越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast Auto Ltd. 的一家经销商店里却热闹非凡，新款车型吸引了众多潜在买家。【原文：On a recent Thursday morning in Hanoi, Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD Co. began the day with a showroom devoid of customers. Just a few kilometers away, a dealership for upstart Vietnamese EV maker VinFast Auto Ltd. was buzzing, with would-be buyers pouring over new models.】

item.title: 新西兰出口超过进口，经济出现积极迹象
item.description: 去年最后三个月，由于肉类运输量激增，新西兰的出口量超过了进口量，这为新西兰经济走出衰退增添了复苏的迹象。【原文：New Zealand exports outpaced imports in the final three months of last year amid a surge in meat shipments, adding to signs of a recovery from recession.】

item.title: 欧元攀升，交易员关注乌克兰和关税问题：市场综述
item.description: 欧元在早盘交易中上涨，因为欧洲领导人在担心美国撤军的情况下争相确保乌克兰的安全。由于唐纳德-特朗普总统准备对加拿大和墨西哥征收长期承诺的关税，同时增加对中国的征税，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一。【原文：The euro gained in early trading as European leaders scrambled to secure Ukraine amid concerns of an American pullback. Asian stocks are set for a mixed start as President Donald Trump prepares to slap long-promised tariffs on Canada and Mexico, while increasing a levy on China.】

item.title: 拯救计划时间紧迫，星空娱乐停牌
item.description: 星际娱乐集团有限公司（Star Entertainment Group Ltd.）股票周一暂停交易，因为这家陷入困境的澳大利亚赌场运营商正试图安排最后一揽子融资计划，以避免倒闭。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. shares were suspended from trading Monday as the struggling Australian casino operator tries to arrange a last-ditch funding package and stave off collapse.】

item.title: 菲利普-莫里斯考虑在无烟转变中出售雪茄
item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International Inc.【原文：Philip Morris International Inc. is exploring a potential sale of its cigar business in the US, people familiar with the matter said, as the tobacco maker continues its shift toward smoke-free products.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 在贸易公司放宽其公司持股上限后，沃伦-巴菲特正在加大在日本的赌注。美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正打算兑现对墨西哥、加拿大和中国征收关税的计划，因为该国计划进口比以往更多的农产品。而德国新当选的领导层正面临着一个挥之不去的权力问题。【原文：Warren Buffett is upping his bets in Japan after trading houses relaxed the ceiling on his company’s holdings. US President Donald Trump is aiming to make good on plans to levy tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China, just as the country plans to import more agricultural goods than ever. And Germany’s newly elected leadership has a lingering power problem waiting for them.】

item.title: 贸易战升温，习近平准备公布中国经济刺激计划
item.description: 习近平主席即将参加中国今年最大的政治会议，他的经济终于重振雄风。唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不断提高的关税将考验中国政府维持这一势头的能力。【原文：President Xi Jinping heads into China’s biggest political huddle of the year with his economy finally getting back some swagger. Donald Trump’s rising tariffs will test Beijing’s ability to sustain that momentum.】

item.title: 当公司的财务总监不是你一个人的时候
item.description:
零散财务主管炙手可热。此外，安森美半导体公司的首席财务官谈到了关税和在捷克共和国的投资。【原文：

item.title: 特朗普向加拿大、墨西哥和中国发起关税攻势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普即将对加拿大和墨西哥征收新的关税，同时对中国加倍征税，此举将极大地扩展他重塑美国经济、开发新收入以及颠覆与美国最大贸易伙伴关系的努力。【原文：President Donald Trump is on the verge of slapping new tariffs on Canada and Mexico while doubling a levy on China, moves that would dramatically expand his push to reshape the US economy, tap new revenues and upend ties with the biggest US trading partners.】

item.title: 荣耀设备承诺为人工智能投入 100 亿美元，力求超越手机制造商的地位
item.description: 中国最大的智能手机制造商之一--荣耀设备有限公司计划在未来五年内投资 100 亿美元，成为人工智能领域的竞争者。【原文：Honor Device Co., one of China’s biggest smartphone makers, plans to invest $10 billion over the next five years to become a contender in the artificial intelligence race.】

item.title: 两项民意调查显示，美国人希望特朗普为经济做出更多努力
item.description: 两项民意调查显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统在上任后的头几周内采取了大量措施，这有可能让担心经济和通货膨胀的美国人感到失望。【原文：Two polls signaled that President Donald Trump risks putting off Americans worried about the economy and inflation with the broad flurry of measures during his first weeks in office.】

item.title: 集团称几内亚比绍领导人威胁驱逐西非经共体特使
item.description: 西非国家经济共同体周日发表声明称，在总统乌马洛-西索科-恩巴洛（Umaro Sissoco Embalo）威胁驱逐代表团后，该区域集团的一个代表团于3月1日离开了几内亚比绍。【原文：A delegation from the Economic Community of West African States left Guinea-Bissau on March 1 after President Umaro Sissoco Embalo threatened to expel the mission, the regional bloc said in statement Sunday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称壳牌正在探索出售在美国和欧洲的化工资产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，壳牌石油公司（Shell PLC）正在探索出售其在美国和欧洲的化工资产的可能性，作为该石油产品巨头重新专注于最赚钱业务的战略的一部分。【原文：Shell PLC is exploring a potential sale of its chemicals assets in the US and Europe as part of a strategy to refocus the petroleum products giant on its most profitable operations, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone、Permira 旗下 Adevinta 接近出售 Willhaben 股份
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，由 Blackstone Inc. 和 Permira 支持的欧洲在线分类公司 Adevinta ASA 即将就出售其在奥地利数字市场 Willhaben 的股份达成协议。【原文：Adevinta ASA, the European online classified company backed by Blackstone Inc. and Permira, is nearing an agreement to sell its stake in Austrian digital marketplace Willhaben, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说普拉达接近范思哲交易，最高价为 15 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，普拉达公司（Prada SpA）在同意以近 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的价格从卡普里控股有限公司（Capri Holdings Ltd. ）手中收购范思哲（Versace）的交易后，正逐步接近该交易。【原文：Prada SpA is moving closer to a deal to buy Versace from Capri Holdings Ltd. after agreeing to a price of nearly €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非唯一的核电站因机组跳闸而停机
item.description: 南非唯一的核电设施的一个机组意外跳闸，导致整个设施停运，使本已紧张的国家电网供应更加紧张。【原文：A unit at South Africa’s sole nuclear power facility unexpectedly tripped, taking the whole facility offline and further stretching supply to the nation’s already-constrained grid.】

item.title: 美元熊市抓住了美国例外论崩溃的概念
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税威胁上周再次提振了美元，但由于有迹象表明美国经济正在降温，而且担心贸易战会进一步削弱美元，越来越多的投资者开始押注美元。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff threats once again lifted the dollar last week, but a growing group of investors is betting against the greenback amid signs the US economy is cooling and on concern a trade war will weaken it further.】

item.title: 贝森特说他认为通胀率将很快达到美联储 2% 的目标
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，在一项民意调查显示美国人希望唐纳德-特朗普总统更加关注降低通胀率之后，他相信美国消费者价格涨幅将在今年放缓。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he’s confident US consumer price increases will slow over the course of the year after a poll suggested Americans want President Donald Trump to focus more on bringing down inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺建立战略性美国加密货币储备后，比特币跳涨
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统表示计划推进美国加密货币储备之后，比特币周日攀升达 3%。【原文：Bitcoin climbed as much as 3% on Sunday after President Donald Trump said he plans to move ahead with a US cryptocurrency reserve.】

item.title: 据说 Allegro 吸引了安森美半导体的收购兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Allegro Microsystems 公司正吸引更大的竞争对手安森美半导体公司的收购兴趣。【原文：Allegro Microsystems Inc. is drawing takeover interest from larger competitor ON Semiconductor Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者正在新兴市场寻找特朗普的 "保险箱
item.description: 从中国人工智能的成功到迪拜移民带动的繁荣，以及委内瑞拉和黎巴嫩债务重组前景的上升，2025 年新兴市场的成功交易都有助于投资者抵御唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易议程。【原文：From China’s artificial-intelligence successes to Dubai’s immigrant-led boom and rising prospects of debt restructuring in Venezuela and Lebanon, the winning emerging-market trades of 2025 all help investors withstand President Donald Trump’s trade agenda.】

item.title: 受降息刺激，2 月份澳大利亚房价反弹
item.description: 由于预期储备银行将在两周前实施四年多来的首次降息，购房者纷纷涌入市场，澳大利亚房价在上个月出现反弹。【原文：Australian house prices rebounded last month as buyers jumped into the market in anticipation of the first interest-rate cut in more than four years which the Reserve Bank then delivered two weeks ago.】

item.title: 苹果在人工智能领域的努力达到了决定成败的关键点
item.description: 亚马逊新推出的 Alexa 系统暴露了苹果公司在人工智能方面的不足，现在苹果公司正处于生死存亡的关头。还有蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的交易内幕，iPad Air 在更新前出现短缺，M4 MacBook Air 即将推出。此外，不要指望苹果会很快放弃 DEI 的努力。【原文：Amazon’s new Alexa has exposed the AI shortcomings of Apple, which is now at a make-or-break point. Also: An inside look at Tim Cook’s trade with President Donald Trump, the iPad Air sees shortages ahead of a pending refresh, and the M4 MacBook Air is about to launch. Plus, don’t expect Apple to drop its DEI effort anytime soon.】

item.title: 马来西亚前总理伊斯梅尔卷入贪污调查
item.description: 马来西亚反腐败委员会周日晚些时候发表声明称，该委员会正在调查涉及前总理伊斯梅尔-萨布里-雅各布（Ismail Sabri Yaakob）的贪污和洗钱指控。【原文：The Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission is investigating allegations of graft and money laundering involving former Prime Minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob, according to a statement late Sunday.】

item.title: 迪拜外籍人士的涌入削弱了丰厚的薪酬待遇和生活方式
item.description: 库珀-费奇（Cooper Fitch）招聘公司的负责人特雷弗-墨菲（Trefor Murphy）回忆说，以前迪拜的招聘启事可能只收到约 100 名应聘者。如今，随着外国人涌入这座以丰厚薪酬和高档生活方式著称的城市，一些招聘广告吸引了多达 2000 名求职者。【原文：Trefor Murphy, the head of recruitment firm Cooper Fitch, recalls a time when a Dubai job posting might have received just about 100 applicants. These days, some draw as many as 2,000 as foreigners flood a city reputed for lucrative paydays and upscale lifestyles.】

item.title: HMD 推出带家长控制和社交媒体锁的手机
item.description: HMD Global Oy 是一家以销售诺基亚品牌手机而闻名的公司，该公司推出了一款新手机，可让父母对孩子上网的时间和方式进行更多控制。【原文：HMD Global Oy, the company known for selling phones under the Nokia brand, unveiled a new handset that will give parents more control over when and how their children get online.】

item.title: 世界银行敦促南非削减劳动和投资方面的繁文缛节
item.description: 世界银行表示，南非应结束 "过度 "的监管负担，并修订黑人所有权法律，以消除困扰其经济的 "瘫痪迹象"。【原文：South Africa should end its “excessive” regulatory burden and revamp its Black-ownership laws to remove the “signs of paralysis” that plague its economy, the World Bank said.】
